description: Defines mandatory revocation triggers, precedence, and propagation for any Phase-Z authorization.

triggers.name: PHASE_Y_POLICY_VIOLATION
triggers.notes: Any violation detected by Phase-Y mediation.

precedence_rules: Phase-X halt supersedes all other triggers
TTL expiry does not require external confirmation

propagation.notes: Revocation propagates synchronously to all authorization checks.

audit_requirements: All revocations must emit an audit record
Audit record must reference triggering condition
Audit record must include timestamp and affected authorization_id(s)
